channel.title: Ruby on Rails development
channel.description: Recent content on Ruby on Rails development

item.description:
You have an idea for a web app?

Let's transform your idea into a web application.

Planning, building, testing, launching, and maintaining your web application - we are there for you.

Who we are

We're a group of web developers. We write code for the web and make great web apps. Our goal is learn something new everyday to build even better web apps.


Meet the team

What we made

Web apps that we build come in different shapes and sizes. From simple web service to complex ecommerce web app. Over the years that gave us the opportunity to tackle different challenges.


Portfolio

What we specialize in

We love coding in Ruby. That's why we specialize in building web apps using Ruby and Ruby on Rails. We love writing about it too. You can read about our experiences on our blog.


Our blog

LATEST PROJECTS

Thompson Learn.

Dream Holidays Insurance

Aligni

Pins

Here's what we can do for you!

We can help you take your web application from an idea to a finished product. Every step of the way you'll have our support - through planning, building, testing, launching, and then maintaining your web application.


More about us

Interested in free consultation?

If you'd like to discuss your project, ask for project estimate, inquire about our availability, or you just want to talk, please get in touch and we'll be happy to respond and help you in any way we can.


Get in touch

CLIENTS

item.title: About
item.description:
More About Orange Iceberg.

Orange Iceberg is a small web development consultancy focused on transforming our client's ideas to functional web applications.

We specialize in building web applications using Ruby and Ruby on Rails. However depending on a project we often assemble and lead a team of various web professionals, with help from our associates.

Why the name Orange Iceberg?

An iceberg is often over 90% underwater with only tip being visible. Most web applications (and software in general) are like that too. There's a pretty interface that makes about 10% of a web app, but underneath it there's still 90% of the app.

We make web applications. They are like icebergs in some sense. It just made sense.

Do you have another question?

If there's anything you'd like to know about Orange Iceberg or you want to talk to us please don't hesitate to contact us.

Contact us See what we worked on

MEET OUR TEAM

Find me on:

Slobodan Kovačević

Lead developer

Web developer with 15+ years of experience. Currently focused on Ruby and Ruby on Rails.

Find me on:

Jovica Šuša

Ruby Developer

Lost his way, worked as web designer. Found Ruby. Every day he learns something new about Ruby and Rails.

Find me on:

Jovana Dačić

Ruby developer

Studied hard to get her MSc in Informatics. Tried doing QA and HTML coding. Decided she likes Ruby programming better.

Find me on:

Ivica Lakatoš

Ruby developer

Worked in sales in a company called Iceberg. Learned to program in Ruby and started working in Orange Iceberg.

Find me on:

Dragan Fabian

Ruby developer

Cares about animals, especially birds. That's all we know.

Find me on:

Marijana Molnar

Ruby developer

Mysterious ex-Java programmer. In process of gathering more information about her.

CLIENTS

FRIENDS & ASSOCIATES

item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
PROJECTS

These are some of the projects we worked on.

Thompson Learn.

Online learning environment that provides an enhanced online learning experience for teachers and students.

Website: https://learn.thompsonbooks.com/

Tagged: Ember, JavaScript, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, API

Client:

Dream Holidays Insurance

Platform for DHI partners and their agencies to automate selling travel insurance policies.

Website: http://app.dreamholidaysinsurance.com/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, jQuery

Client:

Aligni

Aligni is cloud-based software for product lifecycle and manufacturing management. As such the app itself is very large with complex data structures. We have been working as a part of Aligni development team to maintain and expand Aligni features.

Website: https://www.aligni.com/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, API, jQuery

Client:

Pins

Pins provides Pin Lists for Opal Kelly products. Each Pin List is interactive, searchable, filterable, and exportable. It provides data for desktop applications used in manufacturing. Also Pins acts as OAuth provider for other services provided by Opal Kelly.

Website: https://pins.opalkelly.com/

Tagged: Ruby on Rails, API, Google Drive, OAuth provider, desktop app integration

Client:

Ayurveda Finder

Ayurveda Finder is a directory of ayurveda retreats, ayurveda holidays and ayurveda teacher trainings. We have built a centralized content management system used by more than one site through a web service.

Website: http://www.ayurvedafinder.com/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Web Service, API, jQuery, Multilingual

Client:

Yoga.info

An independent selection of exceptional yoga retreats, yoga holidays and yoga teacher trainings. We have built a centralized content management system used by more than one site through a web service.

Website: http://www.yoga.info/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Web Service, API, jQuery, Multilingual

Client:

Meteorites

Meteorites.org shows a collection of beautiful meteorites. Powered by a custom-built content management system (CMS) built according to specific requirements.

Website: http://www.meteorites.org/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, jQuery

Client:

Aerosol Forum

Custom-build multilingual CMS with conference visitor registration and online payment handling. Used on Aerosol Forum and PCD Congress sites.

Website: http://www.aerosol-forum.com/

Tagged: Custom CMS, ecommerce, card payment, multilingual

Client:

PCD Congress

Custom-build multilingual CMS with conference visitor registration and online payment handling. Used on multiple sites.

Website: http://www.pcd-congress.com/

Tagged: Custom CMS, ecommerce, card payment, multilingual

Client:

Opower

Maintenance and implementing new features for custom CMS running on Opower.com.

Website: http://opower.com/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Custom CMS, jQuery

Client:

Sonatype

Used Refinery CMS and custom-built Refinery CMS extensions to create a system tailored according to client's specification.

Website: http://www.sonatype.com/

Tagged: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Refinery CMS

Client:

BlueZeppelin

Online art galleries that enable artist to display their art. Fully automated system with recurring payments subscription.

Website: http://bluezeppelin.com/

Tagged: Ruby on Rails, S3, AWS, subscriptions, recurring payments

Client:
